docs.snippet: European tech start-ups have found that by tailoring their apps to individual cities, they can gain a foothold in the prized American market....
docs.abstract: European tech start-ups have found that by tailoring their apps to individual cities, they can gain a foothold in the prized American market.

headline.main: The Europeans Are Coming, One City at a Time

docs.snippet: The USGA has tweaked the criteria for U.S. Open exemptions over the years without giving up two important objectives. It wants the most deserving players to be at the U.S. Open, and it wants to remain the most democratic of all majors....
docs.lead_paragraph: The USGA has tweaked the criteria for U.S. Open exemptions over the years without giving up two important objectives. It wants the most deserving players to be at the U.S. Open, and it wants to remain the most democratic of all majors.

headline.main: Most US Open Spots Are Going to Qualifiers
headline.print_headline: Most US Open Spots Are Going to Qualifiers

docs.snippet: The San Antonio Spurs were not going to believe Serge Ibaka was really injured until the Oklahoma City Thunder took the court in the opener of the Western Conference finals without their athletic big man....
docs.lead_paragraph: The San Antonio Spurs were not going to believe Serge Ibaka was really injured until the Oklahoma City Thunder took the court in the opener of the Western Conference finals without their athletic big man.

headline.main: Duncan Helps Spurs Rout Thunder 122-105 in Game 1
headline.print_headline: Duncan Helps Spurs Rout Thunder 122-105 in Game 1
